text: 18.6: Sng 137.8; Jer 50.15; 50.29; 51.24; 51.49; 2 Te 1.6; VB 14.10; 16.19Nde mba ruarir gumgi kɨɨv, mbe ndi mbik mbui tɨvi, nde nta ndɨkndɨgɨri. Nde nta ndɨkndɨgɨp, ana mba gumgi ga mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi, tugɨra tɨgɨp vheza mbatɨgar anan nɨɨŋri. Nde mba tɨvara anan muuŋv, nde phenatɨtɨgɨp anan tɨvi mbatɨgir vheza mbatɨgar anan nɨɨŋri. Ana pan ŋanŋani mbɨn havhara guarara, ana ana ndi thama tɨgap ana mbɨ muuŋgiap nde nɨɨŋgi. Nde mba pan ŋanŋani mbɨ, nde wom phenatɨtɨgɨp ana ndi tɨgɨp ana mbɨn muuŋgip, anan nɨɨŋrim, ana anan mbegɨri.
